definitions.definition: To be insensitive , insolent , or rude to (somebody); to affront or demean (someone).
examples: - Marvel owns your gods! - Insulting is not arguing.

definitions.definition: To assail , assault , or attack ; ( specifically , military ) to carry out an assault , attack , or onset without preparation .
To behave in an obnoxious and superior manner (against or over someone).

main_definition: ( transitive ) To be insensitive , insolent , or rude to (somebody); to affront or demean (someone). [from 17th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , also figuratively , obsolete ) To assail , assault , or attack ; ( specifically , military ) to carry out an assault , attack , or onset without preparation .
( intransitive , obsolete ) To behave in an obnoxious and superior manner (against or over someone). [16th–19th c.]
( intransitive , obsolete , rare ) To leap or trample upon.
